mapper.select: select * from THEATER ORDER BY T_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO THEATER (T_ID,NAME,PHONE,ADRESS,CONTENT,SCR_NUM,IMG1,IMG2,IMG3,IMG4,IMG5) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(T_ID),0)+1 FROM THEATER), #{name}, #{phone}, #{adress}, #{content}, #{scr_num}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5})
mapper.update: UPDATE THEATER SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADRESS = #{adress}, CONTENT = #{content}, SCR_NUM = #{scr_num},IMG1 = #{img1}, IMG2 = #{img2}, IMG3 = #{img3}, IMG4 = #{img4}, IMG5 = #{img5} WHERE t_id = #{t_id}
